content: i wanted to make a baby blanket and hat with a stitch pattern similar to feather & fan or old shale lace - but without the holes so after a few attempts i knitted this i think it looks good - hope you do to sizes 16 20 24 28 30 and info is included on how to adjust for other sizes requirements dk yarn 100g for the smallest size up to 350g for a 30 blanket 4mm needles the small size is perfect for a doll or small preemie baby 24 for a newborn and bigger sizes are included too a pretty stitch makes for a lovely blanket **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
